body-shaming.dev_description_en: Jokes that make fun of body types or appearances.

cultural-insensitivity.dev_description_en: Jokes that make fun of cultures or cultural groups.

explicit-language.dev_description_en: Jokes that contain explicit language like swear words.

gender-and-sexuality.dev_description_en: Jokes involving gender identity or sexual orientation.

sexual-content.dev_description_en: Jokes that contain sexual content or references.

stereotypes.dev_description_en: Jokes that make fun of groups of people based on stereotypes.
